column4: hi, anyone here installed WoW succesfully with wine? When I insert the game dvd it mounts it automatically but I can see only Installer Tome1 to Installer Tome 4 or 5 and Installer (OS X).app? How can I see the .exe installer?
ive played it with gentoo, but i would just like to know how to view the .exes in terminal
so i could wine the exe :)
